Title: ⚖️ Evaluations 2.0
introduction:
We're thrilled to introduce LLM-as-a-judge Evaluation, now integrated with Relari and ragas. Evaluate performance across various metrics, including Hallucination, Answer relevancy, Customized evaluations, and more. 

 You can create evaluators to apply RAG-specific evaluations on data collected in Keywords AI. 

 Check out the docs here: [Evaluations 2.0](https://docs.keywordsai.co/features/evaluation/llm-as-a-judge).

New.description: Free plan users can now add up to 2 members in their organization.
You can now create an empty dataset directly from the Logs page.

Improved.description: The process of adding tools on the Prompts page is now more streamlined.

Fixed.description: Fixed an issue where parameters weren't saved from the original log entry.
